data.actual_result: It is here, and when pressed you will see a loading icon for a second. If you press it repeatedly you may see a "Unable to preprocess file" toast appear
data.expected_result: The Send button shouldn't be there in the first place
data.short_description: Attempting to share a space character will enable the Send button, and will trigger a "Unable to preprocess file" toast if pressed repeatedly
data.steps_to_repro: - Share something to Discord that isn't a file - Delete the content of the "comment" box - Input a space character in the comment box - select a server text channel and Send
